completedItems.body:
This pull request updates a broken Pump.fun link 
The old link was missing the /coin/ path, leading to a 404 error. The new link correctly directs to the intended resource.

completedItems.title: Shaw/fix short replies
completedItems.body:
This PR fixes some message handling and especially makes short replies much faster and more cost effective.

Some other issues with startup have been fixed as well, and agents start up simultaneously instead of one after another in a for

completedItems.title: Fix broken image paths
